sharingCriteriaRules.description: If a Case has a parent-child relationship with an account with Company Code = SK, CZ, HU, AT, DE it should be shared (Read/Write permission) with the agents with the CSO Bratislava Agent Role
sharingCriteriaRules.label: Company Code Bratislava

sharingCriteriaRules.description: If a Case has a parent-child relationship with an account with the Company Code = BG it should be shared (Read/Write permission) with the agents with the CSO Bulgaria Agent Role
sharingCriteriaRules.label: Company Code Bulgaria

sharingCriteriaRules.description: If a Case has a parent-child relationship with an account with the Company Code = MD it should be shared (Read/Write permission) with the agents with the CSO Moldova Agent Role
sharingCriteriaRules.label: Company Code Moldova

sharingCriteriaRules.description: If a Case has a parent-child relationship with an account with the Company Code = RO it should be shared (Read/Write permission) with the agents with the CSO Romania Agent Role
sharingCriteriaRules.label: Company Code Romania

sharingCriteriaRules.description: If a Case has a parent-child relationship with an account with the Company Code = RS it should be shared (Read/Write permission) with the agents with the CSO Serbia Agent Role
sharingCriteriaRules.label: Company Code Serbia

sharingOwnerRules.description: When a Case is Owned by a Sales Representative with the AT Regional Manager Role, it should be shared (Read/Write permission) with the Sales Representative with AT Regional Manager Role
sharingOwnerRules.label: AT Regional Manager Role

sharingOwnerRules.description: When a Case is Owned by a Sales Representative with the AT Sales Manager Role, it should be shared (Read/Write permission) with the Sales Representative with AT Sales Manager Role
sharingOwnerRules.label: AT Sales Manager Role

sharingOwnerRules.description: When a Case is Owned by an Agent with the CSO Bratislava Agent Role, all the other Agents with the same role (CSO Bratislava Agent) must have Read/Write permission to that same record
sharingOwnerRules.label: Case Owner Bratislava Agent

sharingOwnerRules.description: When a Case is Owned by an Agent with the CSO Bulgaria Agent Role, all the other Agents with the same role (CSO Bulgaria Agent) must have Read/Write permission to that same record
sharingOwnerRules.label: Case Owner Bulgaria Agent

sharingOwnerRules.description: When a Case is Owned by an Agent with the CSO Management Role, all the other Agents with the same role (CSO Management) must have Read/Write permission to that same record
sharingOwnerRules.label: Case Owner CSO Management

sharingOwnerRules.description: When a Case is Owned by an Agent with the CSO Moldova Agent Role, all the other Agents with the same role (CSO Moldova Agent) must have Read/Write permission to that same record
sharingOwnerRules.label: Case Owner Moldova Agent

sharingOwnerRules.description: When a Case is Owned by an Agent with the CSO Romania Agent Role, all the other Agents with the same role (CSO Romania Agent) must have Read/Write permission to that same record
sharingOwnerRules.label: Case Owner Romania Agent

sharingOwnerRules.description: When a Case is Owned by an Agent with the CSO Serbia Agent Role, all the other Agents with the same role (CSO Serbia Agent) must have Read/Write permission to that same record
sharingOwnerRules.label: Case Owner Serbia Agent
